features: You will receive 2 Pcs of Action Figure Display Holder.

Easy to Use: (No Screwdriver Needed) The Action Figure stand requires little to none assembly time. Will come in 4 components; The Base, Stand, & 2 Gripping claws. Some part of the item comes pre-installed, just press certain parts into corresponding holes to fully assemble it.

Durable and Sturdy: The HG 144 Action Figure Stand is made of high-quality plastic material that is built to last. It is durable and sturdy enough to support most action figures, ensuring that they stay securely in place.

Versatile Compatibility: Action Figure Stand set is fit for 6-8 inch models and are COMPATIBLE with S.H.Figuarts, Mafex Figma, and other humanoid action figure lines such as SD, BB, 1/100, 1/144 Gundam, Saint Cloth Figures, etc. Suitable for action figure or stage or diorama effects. It is an ideal accessory for collectors and enthusiasts of all kinds.
Freely Adjust: The action figure stands are lightweight that you can move the parts around with little to no effort.
body.description: - Package Contents: 2 pcs of HG 144 Action Figure Stand - Easy to Assemble: (No Screwdriver Needed) Each stand (2 Total) comes with 4 components; The Base, Stand, & 2 Gripping claws. Some part of the item comes pre-installed, just press certain parts into corresponding holes to fully assemble it. - Size: Please refer to Image 2 - Material: Made of High Quality Plastic that is built to last - Variety of Uses: Action Figure Stand is designed to be compatible with most action figures, including popular brands such as Marvel, DC, Star Wars, Transformers, Gundam, and many more. - Versatility: The stand can accommodate figures of various sizes all the way up to 8" and shapes and can be adjusted in height to suit different display needs. This makes it a versatile accessory for collectors and enthusiasts of all kinds. - Color: Clear/ Transparent

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.0 4.0 out of 5 stars 199 ratings 4.0 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap but Stands Still
reviews.reviewText: You're getting what you pay for, the hands come apart if you try to them around too much, but they snap back in place. They hold just about any 6in figure I've got (barring TMNT style figures that are too big). Definitely worth the few bucks for them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent, but flimsy
reviews.reviewText: Bought for 1/144 G Witch kits. They fit fine, but can have a hard time with units that have more equipment on them. Don't expect them to be able to support them fully extended. Bit of a downer, but it's still a decent stand in bulk at cheap and I would still recommend if you're not willing to buy something much more expensive

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive alternative that works.
reviews.reviewText: I was very pleased with the stands. The people that have left a lower rating need to realize what they got for what they paid. These are not top of the line stands but they are very functional and extremely cost effective. I will soon buy another 18 pack. Where else are you able to find a working stand for this price.Do not hesitate to buy these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sorry the product broke as soon as we put the toy on. Will not purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Some quality issues but it does the job, and depends on your luck but for the price pretty damn good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mom tired of re-LEGOing
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. As a parent who got tired of having to rebuild LEGO figurines, I was looking for small, inexpensive stands for my son’s figurines. These work great. They were so easy to assemble and manipulate to hold each figurine. I slid the prongs in holes of the LEGOs, but you could do it other ways as well. I have a feeling I’ll be purchasing more of these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am able to position and adjust the figures as needed. You can remove parts to make them shorter if needed, and you can tighten them up so they don't flex. I will be buying more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cool little stands
reviews.reviewText: These work pretty good, were simple to assemble and display, not cheap feeling or wonky, not bad accessories for the price listed

Sirven muy bien para figuras de 3.75 (1:18) para arriba (excepto 12"). Las poses dínamicas ayudan mucho a tu colección y si haces customs esto te encantara.La calidad es muy buena y definitivamente hare más pedidos ya que me acabe las que compre antes.
No había instrucciones de armado muy pequeños pero funcionales

las bases son muy bobitas y con muy buen acabado, son genial para figuras de hasta 15 cm, con figuras mas altas también quedan bien pero solo si no levanta o carga la figura ya que la base queda pequeña con figuras muy grandes; por lo demás todo es excelente, el envió fue super rápido y estuvieron muy baratas.

No esperes que esta base te sirva para realizar poses dinamicas en el aire con tus figuras, a duras penas pueden aguantar el peso de un Gunpla de escala 1/144, los soportes son demasiado delgados y no tienen resistencia en las articulaciones, si quieres algo barato para mantener tus figuras de pie cumplen ese proposito, pero si buscabas poder dales poses dinamicas para exhibicion invierte en unas bases mejores.
En su mayoría las bases vienen demasiado dobladas y no se pueden posar las figuras
